1264530.name: Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl Demo
1264530.description:
Description

Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl is a full 8-bit retro beat-em-up experience with big levels, big bosses, dope combos, and irreverent references to the View Askewniverse. Mall Brawl can be played solo in a 1 player experience where you swap between both Jay and Silent Bob strategically or played with a buddy, in a 2 player co-operative experience, where you fight your way through mallrats, delinquents and security guards to find your way out of the mall and back to the Quickstop. The demo version includes the full first chapter, ready for your enjoyment.

Details

Features

  • Authentic Retro 8-bit Action
  • 2 Player Couch Co-op
  • Single Player Swappable Action Strategy
  • Unorthodox weapon brandishing tactics
  • Rogues gallery of View Askew Enemies
  • Contemporary gameplay mechanics
  • Crisp original chiptune soundtrack

Characters

  • Jay
  • Silent Bob

    Story

    After the incident from the mall that shall remain nameless, the two hetero lifemates are being man hunted by chief rent-a-cop and his off duty officers. Jay and Silent Bob must fight their way through precarious situations in the mall to escape and make it to the Quickstop.
